bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to Harace Furness, 26 January 1881
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839–1919, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.

body.p: I am sorry to have to send you word that I am not feeling in good train at all to-day. I shall be unable to meet you & the other friends at dinner—I send you herewith a couple of pictures (I call it my Quaker picture)—one is for your father—also the books herewith—
